mapper.insert: INSERT INTO job_info(job_name, crontab, job_type, handler_fail_strategy, admin, admin_email, admin_phone, executor_handlers, cmd, params, parent_job_id, child_job_id, create_time, update_time, enable) VALUES (#{jobName}, #{crontab}, #{jobType}, #{handlerFailStrategy}, #{admin}, #{adminEmail}, #{adminPhone}, #{executorHandlers}, #{cmd}, #{params}, #{parentJobId}, #{childJobId}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{enable})
mapper.select: SELECT id, job_name, crontab, job_type, handler_fail_strategy, admin, admin_email, admin_phone, executor_handlers, cmd, params, parent_job_id, child_job_id, create_time, update_time, enable FROM job_info WHERE id = #{id}
